Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to enhance your daily experience. With its innovative features and high-quality materials, it's truly a game-changer in its category. Given its exceptional value and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than what most people pay for similar items. Considering all these factors, I kindly propose a price of $150 for this product. I trust that you will find its benefits worthwhile and hope we can make this transaction happen. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
